title: Did George Soros "March " pay the demonstrators for our lives $300 each?
subtitle: While hundreds of thousands of students and supporters went to the streets to protest the violence of the weapon, the conspiracies blamed a familiar sane man.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Craigslist ads, which offer $300 to each of the individuals participating in the March 24, 2018, "March for our lives," were managed by billionaire organizers.
